LanguageData.PJ_CompArmor.label: Composite armor
LanguageData.PJ_CompArmor.description: There was a time and place where everyone was wearing this armor. Battles ravaged across many planets.
LanguageData.PJ_GenFlight_Y.label: Yellow Flight Suit
LanguageData.PJ_GenFlight_Y.description: A typical flight suit, often worn by Rebel pilots. This yellow version has been available for commercial and private purchase for years, and as such is quite common.
